About Me

A few things about me

BIO

My working life, so far, has been spent selling computers, stereos, home theatre and all manner of tech goods. I have learnt much about teamwork, what people want, and how to satisfy those needs.
I have just completed a Software Engineering degree at Massey University and in this new chapter of my life I intend to take all the things I have learnt at Massey, and in life, and apply them to a new career in software development.

AV World

Senior Sales

In 2011 I helped a friend open a new, very successful stereo shop in Mt Eden called AV World. One of my key responsibilities was to develop and grow our online business. It was during this time that I developed a real interest in software development.

Harvey Norman

Sales/Manager

I worked at Harvey Norman for several years in a variety of roles. These included working as Floor Manager in the Computer department and Convergence manager in the electrical department.

Eastern Hifi

Senior Sales

Working at Eastern Hifi was a delight. I developed a serious passion for good hifi, great music and big speakers!
